DOCUMENTATION.airflow:
## Airflow DAG(s)

Any DAG(s) present in `/airflow` will be automatically deployed to Airflow by CI/CD, when pushed to the `master` branch.
DOCUMENTATION.gitlab: Local | GITLAB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN | A GitLab [personal access token](https://gitlab.com/profile/personal_access_tokens) with `api` scope, used by `yarn download-env` and `yarn upload-env`.

STAGES_DEPLOY_SCRIPTS.test:
deploying_test:
  <<: *deploy_config
  when: on_success
  script:
    - source init-kubectl.sh
    - echo 1 > REPLICAS && echo '-test' > STAGE
    - sh ./scripts/replace_values_yaml.sh values.template.yml
    - helm upgrade --install "$CI_PROJECT_NAME-test" ./chart/
  environment:
    name: test
  except:
    refs:
      - master
STAGES_DEPLOY_SCRIPTS.acc:
deploying_acceptance:
  <<: *deploy_config
  when: on_success
  script:
    - source init-kubectl.sh
    - echo 1 > REPLICAS && echo '-acc' > STAGE
    - sh ./scripts/replace_values_yaml.sh values.template.yml
    - helm upgrade --install "$CI_PROJECT_NAME-acc" ./chart/
  environment:
    name: acceptance
  only:
    refs:
    - develop
STAGES_DEPLOY_SCRIPTS.prod:
deploying_production:
  <<: *deploy_config
  when: on_success
  script:
    - source init-kubectl.sh
    - echo 1 > REPLICAS && echo '' > STAGE
    - sh ./scripts/replace_values_yaml.sh values.template.yml
    - helm upgrade --install "$CI_PROJECT_NAME" ./chart/
  environment:
    name: production
  only:
    refs:
      - master
STAGES_DEPLOY_SCRIPTS.airflow:
deploying_airflow:
  tags:
    - kube-02.bmidevelopment
  dependencies:
    - building
  stage: deploying
  image: python:3
  before_script:
    - pip install awscli
  script:
    - "sed -i \"s/__NAME__/$(cat package.json | grep name | head -1 | sed 's/name//' | sed 's/[\\\",: ]//g')/g\" airflow/*.py"
    - "sed -i \"s/__AUTHOR__/$(cat package.json | grep author | head -1 | sed 's/author//' | sed 's/[\\\",:]//g' | sed 's/^   //')/g\" airflow/*.py"
    - 'sed -i "s/__DOCKER_IMAGE__/$(cat values.template.yml | grep dockerImage: | head -1 | sed ''s/dockerImage://'' | sed ''s/ //g'' | sed ''s/\//\\\//g'')/g" airflow/*.py'
    - 'sed -i "s/__SECRETS__/$(cat values.template.yml | grep envSecretName: | head -1 | sed ''s/envSecretName://'' | sed ''s/ //g'' | sed ''s/__STAGE__//'')/g" airflow/*.py'
    - sed -i "s/__VERSION__/$(echo $CI_COMMIT_SHA)/g" airflow/*.py
    - export PROJECT_PATH=$(echo $CI_PROJECT_NAME | tr -s '-' | tr '-' '_')
    - aws s3 cp airflow/ s3://meh-airflow-bucket/dags/dags/$PROJECT_PATH/ --recursive --include "*.py"
  only:
    refs:
      - master
